text: Pterochitina is an extinct genus of chitinozoans. It was described by Alfred Eisenack in 1955.Pterochitina at ChitDB: Chitinozoans of Baltica. ==Species== * Pterochitina macroptera Eisenack, 1959 * Pterochitina perivelata (Eisenack, 1937) * Pterochitina retracta Eisenack, 1955 ==References== Category:Prehistoric marine animals Category:Fossil taxa described in 1955
title: Pterochitina
